ca.ualberta.team7project.network

Class ElasticSearchOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.team7project.network.ElasticSearchOperation

  • public class ElasticSearchOperation
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for posting and pulling ThreadModel's to/from the Elastic Search server

    Reference zjullion at:
    https://github.com/zjullion/PicPosterComplete

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ElasticSearchOperation()
      Constructs the ElasticSearchOperation and sets up the Gson builder

    • Method Detail

      • pushThreadModel

        public void pushThreadModel(ThreadModel model,
                   ThreadListener refresh)
        Sends a ThreadModel representing a Topic to the server

        Uses an HttpPut request to create or update the document with index matching our uniqueID.

        This call should be synchronous, but might not actually block properly when run

        Does nothing if the request fails.

        Parameters:
        model - a ThreadModel representing a single comment to be json serialized and pushed to the server
        refresh - an object with an onRefresh() method to call afterwards, can be null

      • searchThreads

        public java.util.Collection<ThreadModel> searchThreads(java.lang.String searchString,
                                              java.lang.String searchEntity)
        Queries the Elastic Search server for comments by some search method

        The caller provides a full search string. The simplest search string would be "_search"

        Parameters:
        searchString - the full search string, which is passed directly to Elastic Search
        Returns:
        list of comments/topics that match the search string
